titles.title: We Sing Praises To Your Name, Oh Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We sing praises to your name, oh Lord.
Praises to your name, oh Lord.
For your name is great and greatly to be praised. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Te alabamos solo a Ti oh Se√±or.
Vamos a alabar a Dios.
Porque grande es El,
Y digno de alabar.
